languages.text: "Не осквернять... ни одних уст..." {n}Мейв, кажется, готова потерять сознание. Похоже, священнодействие, собравшее столько зевак, наводит на нее ужас и тошноту.{/n}
"Never again... defile the lips..." {n}Maive looks ready to faint. She seems both terrified and nauseated by this sacred rite that has drawn so many onlookers.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не осквернять... ни одних уст..." {n}Мейв, кажется, готова потерять сознание. Похоже, священнодействие, собравшее столько зевак, наводит на нее ужас и тошноту.{/n}

"Never again... defile the lips..." {n}Maive looks ready to faint. She seems both terrified and nauseated by this sacred rite that has drawn so many onlookers.{/n}

languages.text: “再也不会……玷污喉舌……”{n}梅芙看起来就像是快要晕过去一样。这场神圣仪式吸引了如此多的观众，她似乎对此感到既害怕、又恶心。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Never again... defile the lips..." {n}Maive looks ready to faint. She seems both terrified and nauseated by this sacred rite that has drawn so many onlookers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “再也不会……玷污喉舌……”{n}梅芙看起来就像是快要晕过去一样。这场神圣仪式吸引了如此多的观众，她似乎对此感到既害怕、又恶心。{/n}

languages.text: «Nunca más... profanar los labios...». {n}Maive está a punto de desmayarse. Parece aterrorizada y asqueada por este ritual sagrado que ya ha atraído a numerosos espectadores.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Never again... defile the lips..." {n}Maive looks ready to faint. She seems both terrified and nauseated by this sacred rite that has drawn so many onlookers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nunca más... profanar los labios...». {n}Maive está a punto de desmayarse. Parece aterrorizada y asqueada por este ritual sagrado que ya ha atraído a numerosos espectadores.{/n}

languages.text: "Bir daha asla... Dudakları kirletemesin..." {n}Maive bayılacak gibi oluyor. Bu kadar çok seyirci çeken bu kutsal ayin onu hem dehşete düşürmüş hem de midesini bulandırmış olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Never again... defile the lips..." {n}Maive looks ready to faint. She seems both terrified and nauseated by this sacred rite that has drawn so many onlookers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bir daha asla... Dudakları kirletemesin..." {n}Maive bayılacak gibi oluyor. Bu kadar çok seyirci çeken bu kutsal ayin onu hem dehşete düşürmüş hem de midesini bulandırmış olmalı.{/n}

languages.text: 「もう二度と…唇を汚す…」{n}メイヴは気絶しそうになる。彼女は、この多くの野次馬を引きつけている聖なる慣行に恐怖と吐き気の両方を感じているように思われる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Never again... defile the lips..." {n}Maive looks ready to faint. She seems both terrified and nauseated by this sacred rite that has drawn so many onlookers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もう二度と…唇を汚す…」{n}メイヴは気絶しそうになる。彼女は、この多くの野次馬を引きつけている聖なる慣行に恐怖と吐き気の両方を感じているように思われる。{/n}

languages.text: « Plus jamais... souiller les lèvres... » {n}Maive semble sur le point de perdre connaissance. Visiblement, l'horreur qu'elle ressent n'a d'égale que son écœurement face à ce rite sacré qui a attiré tant de spectateurs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Never again... defile the lips..." {n}Maive looks ready to faint. She seems both terrified and nauseated by this sacred rite that has drawn so many onlookers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Plus jamais... souiller les lèvres... » {n}Maive semble sur le point de perdre connaissance. Visiblement, l'horreur qu'elle ressent n'a d'égale que son écœurement face à ce rite sacré qui a attiré tant de spectateurs.{/n}

languages.text: "Nie wieder ... die Lippen schänden ..." {n}Maive sieht aus, als würde sie gleich in Ohnmacht fallen. Dieses heilige Ritual, das so viele Zuschauer angelockt hat, scheint ihr große Angst und Übelkeit zu bereiten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Never again... defile the lips..." {n}Maive looks ready to faint. She seems both terrified and nauseated by this sacred rite that has drawn so many onlookers.{/n}
